value.title: Power BI Pivot: Move Data from Rows to Columns #Q&A
value.excerpt: I am a huge fan of Unpivot (moving data from Column to Rows), but sometimes Pivot is your friend, when you need to move data from Rows to Columns. value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
value.excerpt: Power BI provides multiple ways of sharing content with users. Each sharing method has pros and cons and can be used for specific scenarios. Some of the sharing methods can be used together to build a framework for sharing. In this post, I will talk about the most basic way of sharing Power BI content.

value.excerpt: Power BI dashboard and reports come with a usage metric, which you can see how users used this content. value.title: Showing Ranking in a Visual in Power BI using RANKX DAX function
value.excerpt: If you want to show the ranking in a Power BI visual, one way is to use a visual that supports that, such as a Ribbon chart.
